Alright...so when do we get to play the new games.

I was also interested in finding out how long it roughly takes after a game submission before it is placed into the archive.

Everyone must butter the sandal...quickly, and with the fervor of untold millions.  (This means you)

Posts.EditableText:
I have a feel Alex would upload the games quicker if they were of slightly better quality. The last batch of game uploads featured some of the worst ones I've ever played, and I don't think games like that really do Quest's reputation any favours.

Saying that, I'd be pretty miffed if I wrote a game and it took a couple of weeks, or even a couple of months, for it to be uploaded. That's the kind of thing that would make me wonder if it was even worth writing another.
